amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part C of House Report 118-280 to prohibit the president from exercising the waiver authority described in section 1245(d)(5) of the 2012 NDAA and sections 1244(i) and 1247(f) of the Iran Freedom and Counter-Proliferation Act of 2012.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the President from exercising the waiver authority described in section 1245(d)(5) of the 2012 NDAA and sections 1244(i) and 1247(f) of the Iran Freedom and Counter-Proliferation Act of 2012.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pfluger amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 198, 1 Present (Roll no. 684).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pfluger amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 198, 1 Present (Roll no. 684).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pfluger amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 198, 1 Present (Roll no. 684).
